Measles (Tests for measles virus by Culture and Identification Method)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org

    67806-0 Measles virus Ag [Presence] in Isolate by Immunofluorescence
    76626-1 Measles virus [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by Organism specific culture
    91780-7 Measles virus [Presence] in Lower respiratory specimen by Organism specific culture
    91786-4 Measles virus [Presence] in Upper respiratory specimen by Organism specific culture
